updates.title: Anthropic commits $50 billion to US data center infrastructure, signaling massive scaling of AI compute capacity for enterprise applications through partnership with Fluidstack.
Figma opens new Bengaluru office as part of strategic expansion beyond design tools to capture developer market in India, indicating broader platform evolution.
Fei-Fei Li's World Labs launches Marble, its first commercial product creating persistent 3D environments, accelerating the race for practical world model applications in creative workflows.
Meta's Chief AI Scientist Yann LeCun reportedly planning departure to launch startup focused on world models, potentially reshaping AI research landscape and competitive dynamics.
AI startups achieving $200M ARR milestone signals maturation of AI-native business models, with OpenAI's startup head noting shift from experimentation to production-ready applications.
